title: Riot banned my IP address
body: Riot games banned my IP address today without stating any reasons whatsoever..  So I'm not able to play league of legends..  what should I do or whom should I contact regarding this matter?  Please help

replies.body: Haven't heard of a case where we've done this, but I'd like to help and see what's going on.  Are you getting a specific error message, and when is it happening?  Anymore details can help a lot in figuring this out, let me know!

Thanks for your concern..  The ban was for 24 hours it seems and it's been lifted..  Riot found some malicious activity from my IP so they banned it as a precaution..  merry Christmas and a happy new year
